Nubra AI

Assistant for Code Conversion and SDK Chat

Open the sidebar once, then use the floating Nubra button at the bottom-right anytime while browsing.

1
Launch Sidebar Click Go to Chat to open Nubra AI on the current tab.
2
Use Floating Button Tap the small Nubra icon in the page corner to reopen instantly.
3
Right-Click Conversion Select code and use Convert with Nubra AI where browser context menu is available.
